00046 
00047 Session::Session(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &cfg, SessionCallback *cb)
00048   : m_comm(comm), m_verbose(false), m_silent(false), m_state(STATE_JEOPARDY),
00049     m_session_callback(cb) {
00050   uint16_t master_port;
00051   String master_host;
00052 
00053   HT_TRY("getting config values",
00054     m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00055     m_silent = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Silent");
00056     master_host = cfg->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Host");
00057     master_port = cfg->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00058     m_grace_period = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.GracePeriod");
00059     m_lease_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval"));
00060 
00061   m_timeout_ms = m_lease_interval * 2;
00062 
00063   HT_EXPECT(InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, master_host.c_str(),
00064             master_port), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00065 
00066   boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00067   xtime_add_millis(m_expire_time, m_grace_period);
00068 
00069   m_keepalive_handler_ptr = new ClientKeepaliveHandler(comm, cfg, this);
00070 }
00071 
00072 Session::~Session() {
00073   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->destroy_session();
00074 }

00076 
00077 uint64_t
00078 Session::open(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr,
00079               Timer *timer) {
00080   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00081   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00082 
00083   handle_state->handle = 0;
00084   handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00085   handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00086   uint32_t open_flags = handle_state->open_flags;
00087 
00088   if ((open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED)
00089     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00090   else if ((open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE)
00091     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00092   else
00093     handle_state->lock_mode = 0;
00094 
00095  try_again:
00096   if (!wait_for_safe())
00097     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00098 
00099   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00100   if (error == Error::OK) {
00101     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00102       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get());
00103       HT_THROWF(error,  "Hyperspace 'open' error, name=%s flags=0x%x events=0x"
00104                 "%x", handle_state->normal_name.c_str(), open_flags,
00105                 handle_state->event_mask);
00106     }
00107     else {
00108       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00109       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00110       handle_state->handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00111       decode_byte(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00112       handle_state->lock_generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00114       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->register_handle(handle_state);
00115       return handle_state->handle;
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00120   goto try_again;
00121 
00122 }

00125 uint64_t
00126 Session::open(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags,
00127               HandleCallbackPtr &callback, Timer *timer) {
00128   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00129   std::vector<Attribute> empty_attrs;
00130 
00131   handle_state->open_flags = flags;
00132   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00133   handle_state->callback = callback;
00134   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00135 
00136   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name,
00137                       flags, callback, empty_attrs));
00138 
00139   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr, timer);
00140 }

00143 uint64_t
00144 Session::create(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags,
00145                 HandleCallbackPtr &callback,
00146                 std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs, Timer *timer) {
00147   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00148 
00149   handle_state->open_flags = flags | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_EXCL;
00150   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00151   handle_state->callback = callback;
00152   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00153 
00154   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name,
00155                       handle_state->open_flags, callback, init_attrs));
00156 
00157   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr, timer);
00158 }

00164 void Session::close(uint64_t handle, Timer *timer) {
00165   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00166   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00167   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_close_request(handle));
00168 
00169  try_again:
00170   if (!wait_for_safe())
00171     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00172 
00173   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00174   if (error == Error::OK) {
00175     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00176       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00177                "Hyperspace 'close' error");
00178   }
00179   else {
00180     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00181     goto try_again;
00182   }
00183 }

00243 bool Session::exists(const std::string &name, Timer *timer) {
00244   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00245   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00246   String normal_name;
00247 
00248   normalize_name(name, normal_name);
00249 
00250   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_exists_request(normal_name));
00251 
00252  try_again:
00253   if (!wait_for_safe())
00254     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00255 
00256   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00257   if (error == Error::OK) {
00258     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00259       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00260                 "Hyperspace 'exists' error, name=%s", normal_name.c_str());
00261     }
00262     else {
00263       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00264       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00265       uint8_t bval = decode_byte(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00266       return (bval == 0) ? false : true;
00267     }
00268   }
00269 
00270   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00271   goto try_again;
00272 }

00274 
00277 void Session::attr_set(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name,
00278                        const void *value, size_t value_len, Timer *timer) {
00279   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00280   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00281   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_set_request(handle, name, value,
00282                       value_len));
00283 
00284  try_again:
00285   if (!wait_for_safe())
00286     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00287 
00288   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00289   if (error == Error::OK) {
00290     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00291       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00292       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00293       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00294         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00295       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00296                 "Problem setting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'",
00297                 name.c_str(), fname.c_str());
00298     }
00299     return;
00300   }
00301 
00302   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00303   goto try_again;
00304 }

00307 void
00308 Session::attr_get(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name,
00309                   DynamicBuffer &value, Timer *timer) {
00310   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00311   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00312   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_get_request(handle, name));
00313 
00314  try_again:
00315   if (!wait_for_safe())
00316     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00317 
00318   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00319   if (error == Error::OK) {
00320     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00321       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00322       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00323       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00324         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00325       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00326                 "Problem getting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'",
00327                 name.c_str(), fname.c_str());
00328     }
00329     else {
00330       uint32_t attr_val_len = 0;
00331       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00332       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00333       void *attr_val = decode_bytes32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain,
00334                                       &attr_val_len);
00335       value.clear();
00336       value.ensure(attr_val_len+1);
00337       value.add_unchecked(attr_val, attr_val_len);
00338       // nul-terminate to make caller's lives easier
00339       *value.ptr = 0;
00340     }
00341   }
00342   else {
00343     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00344     goto try_again;
00345   }
00346 }

00380 
00381 void
00382 Session::readdir(uint64_t handle, std::vector<DirEntry> &listing,
00383                  Timer *timer) {
00384   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00385   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00386   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_readdir_request(handle));
00387 
00388  try_again:
00389   if (!wait_for_safe())
00390     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00391 
00392   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00393   if (error == Error::OK) {
00394     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00395       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00396                "Hyperspace 'readdir' error");
00397     }
00398     else {
00399       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00400       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00401       uint32_t entry_cnt;
00402       DirEntry dentry;
00403       try {
00404         entry_cnt = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00405       }
00406       catch (Exception &e) {
00407         HT_THROW2(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e, "");
00408       }
00409       listing.clear();
00410       for (uint32_t i=0; i<entry_cnt; i++) {
00411         try {
00412           decode_dir_entry(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain, dentry);
00413         }
00414         catch (Exception &e) {
00415           HT_THROW2F(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e,
00416                      "Problem decoding entry %d of READDIR return packet", i);
00417         }
00418         listing.push_back(dentry);
00419       }
00420     }
00421   }
00422   else {
00423     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00424     goto try_again;
00425   }
00426 }

00429 
00430 void
00431 Session::lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, LockSequencer *sequencerp,
00432               Timer *timer) {
00433   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00434   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00435   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, false));
00436   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00437   uint32_t status = 0;
00438 
00439   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00440     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00441 
00442   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00443     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00444 
00445  try_again:
00446   if (!wait_for_safe())
00447     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00448 
00449   {
00450     ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00451     sequencerp->mode = mode;
00452     sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00453     handle_state->sequencer = sequencerp;
00454   }
00455 
00456   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00457   if (error == Error::OK) {
00458     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00459       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00460                 "Hyperspace 'lock' error, name='%s'",
00461                 handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00462     else {
00463       ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00464       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00465       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00466       handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00467       try {
00468         status = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00469 
00470         if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00471           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00472           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00473           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00474         }
00475         else {
00476           assert(status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00477           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_PENDING;
00478           while (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING)
00479             handle_state->cond.wait(lock);
00480           if (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_CANCELLED)
00481             HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_REQUEST_CANCELLED, "");
00482           assert(handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED);
00483         }
00484       }
00485       catch (Exception &e) {
00486         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "lock response decode error");
00487       }
00488     }
00489   }
00490   else {
00491     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00492     goto try_again;
00493   }
00494 
00495 }
00496 
00497 
00498 void
00499 Session::try_lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, uint32_t *statusp,
00500                   LockSequencer *sequencerp, Timer *timer) {
00501   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00502   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00503   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, true));
00504   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00505 
00506   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00507     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00508 
00509   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00510     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00511 
00512  try_again:
00513   if (!wait_for_safe())
00514     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00515 
00516   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00517   if (error == Error::OK) {
00518     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00519       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00520                 "Hyperspace 'try_lock' error, name='%s'",
00521                 handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00522     else {
00523       ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00524       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00525       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00526       try {
00527         *statusp = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00528 
00529         if (*statusp == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00530           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00531           sequencerp->mode = mode;
00532           sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00533           handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00534           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00535           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00536           handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00537         }
00538       }
00539       catch (Exception &e) {
00540         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "try_lock response decode error");
00541       }
00542     }
00543   }
00544   else {
00545     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00546     goto try_again;
00547   }
00548 
00549 }
00550 
00551 
00552 void Session::release(uint64_t handle, Timer *timer) {
00553   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00554   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00555   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_release_request(handle));
00556   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00557 
00558   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00559     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00560 
00561  try_again:
00562   if (!wait_for_safe())
00563     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00564 
00565   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00566   if (error == Error::OK) {
00567     ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00568     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00569       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00570                "Hyperspace 'release' error");
00571     handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00572     handle_state->cond.notify_all();
00573   }
00574   else {
00575     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00576     goto try_again;
00577   }
00578 
00579 }

00581 
00582 
00583 void
00584 Session::get_sequencer(uint64_t handle, LockSequencer *sequencerp,
00585                        Timer *timer) {
00586   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00587 
00588   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00589     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00590 
00591   if (handle_state->lock_generation == 0)
00592     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_NOT_LOCKED, "");
00593 
00594   sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00595   sequencerp->mode = handle_state->lock_mode;
00596   sequencerp->generation = handle_state->lock_generation;
00597 
00598 }

00603 void Session::check_sequencer(LockSequencer &sequencer, Timer *timer) {
00604   HT_WARN("CheckSequencer not implemented.");

00607 
00610 int Session::status(Timer *timer) {
00611   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00612   EventPtr event_ptr;
00613   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_status_request());
00614   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00615   if (error == Error::OK) {
00616     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00617       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00618   }
00619   return error;
00620 }
00621 
00622 
00623 int Session::state_transition(int state) {
00624   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00625   int old_state = m_state;
00626   m_state = state;
00627   if (m_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00628     m_cond.notify_all();
00629     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_JEOPARDY)
00630       m_session_callback->safe();
00631   }
00632   else if (m_state == STATE_JEOPARDY) {
00633     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00634       m_session_callback->jeopardy();
00635       boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00636       xtime_add_millis(m_expire_time, m_grace_period);
00637     }
00638   }
00639   else if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED) {
00640     if (m_session_callback && old_state != STATE_EXPIRED)
00641       m_session_callback->expired();
00642     m_cond.notify_all();
00643   }
00644   return old_state;
00645 }
00646 
00647 
00648 int Session::get_state() {
00649   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00650   return m_state;
00651 }
00652 
00653 
00654 bool Session::expired() {
00655   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00656   boost::xtime now;
00657   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00658   if (xtime_cmp(m_expire_time, now) < 0)
00659     return true;
00660   return false;
00661 }
00662 
00663 
00664 bool Session::wait_for_connection(uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00665   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00666   boost::xtime drop_time, now;
00667 
00668   boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00669   xtime_add_millis(drop_time, max_wait_ms);
00670 
00671   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00672     m_cond.timed_wait(lock, drop_time);
00673     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00674     if (xtime_cmp(now, drop_time) >= 0)
00675       return false;
00676   }
00677   return true;
00678 }
00679 
00680 
00683 bool Session::wait_for_connection(Timer &timer) {
00684   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00685   boost::xtime drop_time;
00686 
00687   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00688     boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00689     xtime_add_millis(drop_time, timer.remaining());
00690     if (!m_cond.timed_wait(lock, drop_time))
00691       return false;
00692   }
00693   return true;
00694 }
00695 
00696 
00697 bool Session::wait_for_safe() {
00698   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00699   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00700     if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED)
00701       return false;
00702     m_cond.wait(lock);
00703   }
00704   return true;
00705 }
00706 
00707 int
00708 Session::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *handler,
00709                       Timer *timer) {
00710   int error;
00711   uint32_t timeout_ms = timer ? (time_t)timer->remaining() : m_timeout_ms;
00712 
00713   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, timeout_ms, cbuf_ptr,
00714       handler)) != Error::OK) {
00715     std::string str;
00716     if (!m_silent)
00717       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to Hypertable.Master at %s failed - %s",
00718                m_master_addr.format().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00719   }
00720   return error;
00721 }
00722 
00723 
00724 void Session::normalize_name(const String &name, String &normal) {
00725 
00726   if (name == "/") {
00727     normal = name;
00728     return;
00729   }
00730 
00731   normal = "";
00732   if (name[0] != '/')
00733     normal += "/";
00734 
00735   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == string::npos)
00736     normal += name;
00737   else
00738     normal += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00739 }
00740 
00744 HsCommandInterpreter *Session::create_hs_interpreter()
00745 {
00746   return new HsCommandInterpreter(this);
00747 }
